title: France Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in France decreased to 284.20 percent in 2021 from 297.30 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in France averaged 212.34 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 297.30 percent in 2020 and a record low of 163.20 percent in 1998. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
